title: Ticket #857: NOTICE.txt missing from source tarball
description: The NOTICE.txt file is not present in the top level of the released source tarball.
remarks:
2009-Oct-15 11:04:34 by psilord:
I happen to be looking at the code that implements this. I could probably fix it in ten minutes.

2009-Oct-15 11:28:13 by psilord:
Meh, I fixed it. It should now appear in the source tarball.
check_ins: 2009-Oct-15 11:26   Check-in [16071]: This adds the NOTICE.txt file, which contains copyright source information, to the release source tarball. #857 (By Peter Keller )
